## Condition Harbinger - Snowcrows
Last Update: Dec 30, 2022

Source: https://snowcrows.com/en/builds/necromancer/harbinger/condition-harbinger

Rotation Templates: 
P1 - Opening - `[&]`

Shroud Loop - `[&]`

P2 - Pistol Loop, Shroud Scepter Loop, Scepter Loop - 

Notes: This rotation has a section that is priority based. You must learn that priority list on your own. Because of this, the rotation templates provided are only sections of the entire rotation and will not teach you the full rotation.
